actions.text: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service Discharged by Unanimous Consent.
Called up by House by Unanimous Consent.
Received in the Senate and read twice and referred to the Committee on Governmental Affairs.
Referred to Subcommittee on Civil Service and General Services.
Committee on Governmental Affairs requested executive comment from U.S. Postal Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to designate the United States Post Office to be constructed in Barnwell, South Carolina, as the "Solomon Blatt, Sr., Post Office".

summary.text: (Measure passed House, amended) Designates the Post Office to be constructed on Main Street, Barnwell, South Carolina, as the Solomon Blatt, Sr., Post Office Building.

titles.title: A bill to designate the United States Post Office to be constructed in Barnwell, South Carolina, as the "Solomon Blatt, Sr., Post Office".
